content.rendered:
Tarikh Harga Baki Seat
21 – 25 Feb 2018 RM3199 RM3090 Sold Out
23-27 Nov 2018 RM3290 RM3199 Available
2-6 Dec 2018 RM3290RM3199 Available
3-7 Dec 2018 RM3290RM3199 Available
4-8 Dec 2018 RM3290 RM3199 Available
5-9 Dec 2018 RM3290 RM3199 Available
6-10 Dec 2018 RM3290 RM3199 Available
7-11 Dec 2018 RM3290 RM3199 Available
9-13 Dec 2018 RM3290 RM3199 Available
12-16 Dec 2018 RM3290 RM3199 Available
13-17 Dec 2018 RM3290 RM3199 Available
14-18 Dec 2018 RM3290 RM3199 Available
15-19 Dec 2018 RM3390 RM3299 Available
18-22 Dec 2018 RM3390 RM3299 Available

Untuk pakej musim bunga 2018, klik di sini.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1518140033816{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]Harga Dalam Ringgit (MYR)

Dewasa Kanak-Kanak Berkatil Kanak-Kanak Tidak Berkatil Bayi
RM3199 RM2799 RM2599 RM500

Harga sesetengah tarikh mungkin berbeza, Hubungi kami untuk harga lengkap.[/vc_column_text][vcex_heading text=”Aturcara Program” tag=”h3″ font_size=”22px” css=”.vc_custom_1515787020421{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}” color=”#e84677″][vc_column_text]DAY 1 : ARRIVAL – PETITE FRANCE – NAMI ISLAND – SKI RESORT (L/D)

Arrival In Incheon International Airport And Meeting With Tour Guide At The Airport. Lunch. Transfer To Nami Island & Tour. After that visit Petite France. Petite France is a French style park that constructed in July 2008 and popular as runningman shooting location. Dinner and after That, Transfer To Ski Resort. Check In Hotel & Rest.

DAY 2 : SKI RESORT – STRAWBERRY FARM – CHEESE MAKING – DONGDAEMUN (B/L/D)

Breakfast At Hotel And Enjoy The Ski Experience In One Of The Largest Ski Resort In Korea. Lunch. Then Transfer To Strawberry Farm (Testing Strawberry & Plugging Experience). After That, Transfer To Sheep Farm And Enjoy Making Cheese Experience.  Visit the Dongdaemun district night market. Dinner And Check In Hotel.

DAY 3 : SEOUL CITY TOUR (B/L/D)

Breakfast At Hotel. Start Your Days By Visiting Gyeongbok Palace & National Folk Museum. We Will Be Passing Blue House President. After That Experience Korean Korean Ginseng In Ginseng Outlet And Learn More About Cosmetic In Skin Care Cosmetic Center. Shopping Session In Duty Free Shop and visit Namsan Hanok Village. End your day with the visit to Namsan Tower (N Seoul Tower). Dinner And Check In Hotel.

DAY 4 : HALF DAY NAMSAN DISTRICT TOUR – FREE & EASY (B/L/NO D)

Breakfast At Hotel. Visit Amethyst Factory And and then, enjoy the scenery in Iteawon Street and visit the only Mosque in Seoul (Seoul Mosque).

Start Your Free & Easy Activity with Shopping in Namdaemun & Myeongdong Shopping Street.

DAY 5 : DEPARTURE (B)

Breakfast At Hotel. Transfer To Korean Local Market Shop. Transfer To Incheon International Airport and Flight Back To your hometown.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1515782531246{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-left-color: #ececec !important;border-right-color: #ececec !important;border-top-color: #ececec !important;border-bottom-color: #ececec !important;}”][vcex_heading text=”Pakej Termasuk” tag=”h3″ font_size=”22px” css=”.vc_custom_1515786904420{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}” color=”#e84677″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1517244663812{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}” line_height=”26px”] Penerbangan Airasia
Penginapan Hotel 3 bintang
Makanan Halal seperti dalam jadual
Pemandu Pelancong & Tippings
Pengangkutan Bas Persendirian
Tiket lawatan seperti dalam jadual[/vc_column_text][vcex_heading text=”Pakej Tidak Termasuk” tag=”h3″ font_size=”22px” css=”.vc_custom_1515786918310{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}” color=”#e84677″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1517244644045{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}” line_height=”26px”] Insuran Pelancongan
Pengurusan VISA untuk bukan warganegara Malaysia
Perkara selain daripada yang disebutkan dalam jadual
Wang saku dan perbelanjaan sendiri[/vc_column_text][vcex_heading text=”Perlukan pakej ground sahaja?” tag=”h3″ icon=”fa fa-bed” font_size=”22px” css=”.vc_custom_1515786942233{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}” color=”#e84677″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1515786607402{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]Apa itu pakej ground? Pakej ground bermaksud pakej tanpa penerbangan. Anda akan menguruskan tiket penerbangan anda sendiri dan kami akan sediakan pengurusan tour di destinasi anda daripada A-Z.[/vc_column_text][vcex_button url=”#” target=”blank” layout=”expanded” size=”medium” title=”Pakej Ground” custom_background=”#e84677″ border_radius=”50″ custom_hover_background=”#8d1b3d” css_wrap=”.vc_custom_1515786636860{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}” font_padding=”top:10px|right:25px|bottom:10px|left:25px” font_weight=”700″]Klik untuk Pakej Ground[/vcex_button][vcex_heading text=”Muat Turun Jadual Lengkap” tag=”h3″ icon=”fa fa-print” font_size=”22px” css=”.vc_custom_1515786955795{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}” color=”#e84677″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1515786451203{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]Muat turun jadual dalam bentuk pdf ataupun cetak terus info jadual lengkap daripada laman web ini.[/vc_column_text][vcex_button url=”#” target=”blank” layout=”expanded” size=”medium” title=”Muat Turun” custom_background=”#e84677″ border_radius=”50″ custom_hover_background=”#8d1b3d” font_padding=”top:10px|right:25px|bottom:10px|left:25px” font_weight=”700″]Klik untuk Muat Turun[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”15″ equal_height=”yes” remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515782518299{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-color: #ececec !important;}”][vcex_heading text=”Berhubung Dengan Kami” tag=”h3″ icon=”fa fa-handshake-o” font_size=”22px” css=”.vc_custom_1515784777864{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}” color=”#e84677″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1515860642387{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]Hubungi kami hari ini untuk dapatkan sebut harga untuk servis yang anda perlukan.Kami boleh dihubungi melalui email ataupun di talian:[/vc_column_text][vcex_icon_box style=”two” heading=”03-95441442″ icon=”fa fa-phone” url_wrap=”true” font_color=”#fbdde6″ heading_color=”#ffffff” heading_weight=”bold” heading_size=”24″ url=”tel:0389575770″ css=”.vc_custom_1515860601446{margin-bottom: 40px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 15px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-color: #e84677 !important;border-radius: 3px !important;}” heading_bottom_margin=”0″ icon_color=”#e84677″ icon_background=”#ffffff” icon_size=”22px” icon_border_radius=”50px” icon_width=”60px” icon_height=”60px” hover_background=”#e42861″]Isnin-Jumaat (9.00am-5.30pm)[/vcex_icon_box][vcex_heading text=”Kenapa Anda Patut Pilih Kami?” tag=”h3″ icon=”fa fa-question-circle-o” font_size=”22px” css=”.vc_custom_1515785007034{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}” color=”#e84677″][vc_column_text line_height=”26px”] Syarikat berdaftar dengan kementerian
 Pakej tiada tips (bayaran) tersembunyi
 Deposit terendah & bayaran ansuran
 Servis kualiti muslim yang lebih baik
 Harga pakej dibawah harga pasaran
 Pakej fleksibel dan mengikut bajet anda
 Team kami sentiasa ada untuk anda[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1515787326756{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px color=”#e84677″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1515787537436{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]Kami akan emailkan anda butiran lanjut perjalanan, jumlah bayaran penuh untuk kumpulan anda dan info pakej lengkap dalam masa 5 minit.[/vc_column_text][vcex_form_shortcode full_width=”true” cf7_id=”1054″][/vcex_form_shortcode][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”15″ equal_height=”yes”
